packages.name: IT Administrator Pack
packages.headline: Comprehensive Management with Predictive Vision
packages.summary: Continuous monitoring, alerts, reports, and remote admin for Microsoft 365, Azure, and Teams.
packages.description: The IT Administrator Pack keeps your Microsoft 365, Azure, and Teams environment optimized, secure, and under control. It combines human supervision with AI-powered automation to detect issues before they impact productivity.
keyFeatures: Continuous monitoring of Microsoft 365, Azure, and Microsoft Teams.
Early alerts generated by predictive AI.
Remote technical support and advanced administration.
packages.idealFor: Companies that want operational stability and tech efficiency without hiring or expanding an in-house IT team.
primaryCtas: Request your free IT environment evaluation
Schedule a call with our team

faqs.q: What is included in your IT Administrator Pack?
faqs.a: The IT Administrator Pack provides continuous monitoring and proactive management of your Microsoft 365, Azure, and Teams environment. It includes predictive AI alerts, automated performance and availability reports, and remote technical support with advanced administration. It’s designed to keep your systems stable, secure, and efficient without expanding your internal IT team.

faqs.q: We don’t have a full IT department. Is this pack for us?
faqs.a: Yes. The IT Administrator Pack is ideal for companies that want professional management of Microsoft 365 and Azure but don’t want to hire a large in-house IT team. CelesteIQ acts as your external IT and cloud administration partner, with AI helping detect issues before they become problems.

packages.name: Power Platform Pack
packages.headline: Automate. Analyze. Improve.
packages.summary: AI-enhanced workflows with Power Automate, Power Apps, and Power BI.
packages.description: The Power Platform Pack helps companies eliminate repetitive tasks and accelerate processes using Power Automate, Power Apps, and Power BI enhanced with AI. It connects your applications, visualizes key data, and supports faster, data-driven decisions.
keyFeatures: Custom business apps using Power Apps.
Full integration with Microsoft Teams and Dynamics 365.
packages.idealFor: Organizations that want to turn data into actions and transform processes into opportunities.
primaryCtas: Talk to a Power Platform specialist

faqs.q: How does the Power Platform Pack help my business?
faqs.a: It helps you eliminate manual tasks by using Power Automate, Power Apps, and Power BI—enhanced with AI. You get intelligent workflows, real-time dashboards, and custom applications fully integrated with Microsoft Teams and Dynamics 365, so your data actually drives decisions instead of sitting in spreadsheets.

faqs.q: Is this pack only for technical teams?
faqs.a: No. The Power Platform Pack is designed for business users and IT together. CelesteIQ builds low-code solutions that are easy to use for operations, finance, HR, and other departments, while keeping governance and security aligned with IT.

packages.name: Modern Workplace Pack
packages.headline: Enhanced Productivity with Copilot
packages.summary: Modern collaboration with Microsoft 365, Teams, SharePoint, and Copilot.
packages.description: The Modern Workplace Pack reinvents collaboration using Microsoft 365, Teams, SharePoint, and Copilot. It creates digital workplaces where teams can communicate, collaborate, and make better decisions with integrated AI assistance.
keyFeatures: Integration of Copilot and customized virtual assistants.
Advanced data security for collaboration environments.
packages.idealFor: Companies that need to boost collaboration and productivity across teams with a modern, AI-supported digital workplace.
primaryCtas: Speak with a Modern Workplace specialist

faqs.q: What is the Modern Workplace Pack?
faqs.a: It’s a package that modernizes collaboration with Microsoft 365, Teams, SharePoint, and Copilot. CelesteIQ creates a digital workplace where your teams can communicate, co-create documents, and make better decisions with AI support—for example, automatic meeting summaries, email drafts, and smart document search.

faqs.q: Is Copilot included in this pack?
faqs.a: Yes. The Modern Workplace Pack includes the integration of Copilot and customized virtual assistants, plus the configuration and automation needed for daily use inside tools like Teams, Outlook, and SharePoint.

packages.name: Intelligent Security Pack
packages.headline: Prevention, Protection, and Automated Response
packages.summary: Proactive security with Defender, Entra ID, Azure Sentinel, and AI.
packages.description: The Intelligent Security Pack combines Defender, Entra ID, and Azure Sentinel with AI algorithms to detect threats in real time. It focuses on proactive prevention and automated response rather than reactive security.
keyFeatures: Predictive alerts and continuous learning from threats.
packages.idealFor: Organizations that want to protect data with intelligence, reduce risk of breaches, and maintain continuous security posture.

faqs.q: How does the Intelligent Security Pack protect my company?
faqs.a: This pack combines Microsoft Defender, Entra ID, and Azure Sentinel with AI algorithms that detect threats in real time. It focuses on vulnerability analysis, 24/7 incident monitoring, predictive alerts, and adaptive security policies so your security is proactive instead of reactive.

Yes. The Intelligent Security Pack is designed for continuous monitoring and automated response. CelesteIQ’s systems and AI tools are active 24/7, analyzing activities and blocking suspicious behavior automatically where possible.

faq.a: You can email us at support@celesteiq.com or use the contact form on the website.

CelesteIQ helps businesses transform their operations using Microsoft + AI. The team implements intelligent solutions around Microsoft 365, Power Platform, Azure, Copilot, Dynamics 365, and security tools to automate processes, improve productivity, and enable data-driven decisions.

CelesteIQ mainly serves B2B organizations—such as professional services, finance, healthcare, manufacturing, and real estate—that want to modernize their workflows, automate repetitive tasks, and securely adopt AI without building a large internal IT team.
